content: that bad habit together as we stitch through this project the goal of this knit-along is to bring you joy it s an opportunity to learn new stitch combinations to play with color and to create something special knowing that other knitters around the world are right beside you cheering you on if you don t finish that s okay if you do finish congratulations one of my favorite aspects of knit-alongs is the camaraderie they engender we celebrate when things go right we commiserate when things go wrong we remind each other that no matter how things go we are in this together we demonstrate kindness to one another the same kindness each of us should give ourselves * click here 12 to watch a video about this month s clue * the sample shawl used approximately 1207 m / 1320 yds in total color a 46 m / 50 yds color b 55 m / 60 yds color c 110 m / 120 yds color d 105 m / 115 yds color e 124 m / 135 yds color f 119 m / 130 yds color g 101 m / 110 yds color h 110 m / 120 yds color i 91 m / 100 yds color j 105 m / 115 yds color k 101 m / 110 yds and color l 142 m / 155 yds * **it is important that you save all of your leftover yarn until the end ** * gauge isn t crucial but can affect overall dimensions and yarn amounts *designed by janica york carter* you ll receive a digital file only instantly downloadable as a pdf and won t be shipped anything please allow a few minutes for the download link to be emailed to you if the email doesn t arrive within a few minutes just log into your account on our site and you ll see your completed orders from there you ll find the download link enjoy your knitting chandi new read about our pattern download process here 13 * knowing that we can be loved exactly as we are gives us all the best opportunity for growing into the healthiest of people -
